name: skill-developer
description: Guide for creating Maestro Marketplace-compatible skills and micro-skills. Provides interactive wizard for skill creation, manifest generation assistance, Tactical 4-D methodology guidance, and registry integration. Use when creating new skills, updating existing skills to marketplace standards, generating skill manifests, understanding three-tier architecture (Conductor → Orchestrators → Musicians), debugging skill discovery, or implementing micro-skill chaining patterns. Covers both Tier 2 orchestrators (domain expertise, tactical decisions) and Tier 3 micro-skills (single operations, error handling).

inputs.name: skill_type
inputs.description: Type of skill to create: 'tier-2-skill' (orchestrator with domain expertise) or 'tier-3-micro-skill' (single-purpose operation)

inputs.name: domain
inputs.description: Domain expertise area: 'code', 'marketing', 'analytics', 'writing', 'data', 'file-operations', or custom domain

inputs.name: use_case
inputs.description: Specific use case or problem the skill solves (concrete example)

inputs.name: expertise
inputs.description: Domain expertise this skill provides (patterns, thresholds, standards)

inputs.name: micro_skills_needed
inputs.description: List of micro-skills this skill will chain (for Tier 2 skills)

outputs.name: skill_package
outputs.description: Complete skill implementation with SKILL.md, manifest JSON, directory structure, and reference documentation

outputs.name: manifest
outputs.description: Registry-compatible skill manifest with name, description, capabilities, inputs/outputs, and metadata

outputs.name: validation_report
outputs.description: Validation results with checklist status, registry discovery test, and recommendations

suggestedNextSkills.reason: Validate created skill against excellence standards
If creating code domain skill, analyze patterns

author: Maestro Framework
